title: Personalized Mathematics Education and Continuous Assessment Process Using Intelligent Tutoring Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (operations, equations, functions)
context.additional_context: VR-based learning environment designed to strengthen data analysis and decision-making competencies required by managers/leaders in workplace settings

learning_goals: Based on personalized profiles generated from a pre-diagnostic assessment (10-item learning style survey + 20-item basic math test), learners analyze and provide customized math content (3 videos + 15 practice problems) within 2 weeks, aligned with 3 learning types (visual/auditory/kinesthetic) and 5 difficulty levels (beginner to advanced)
Learners can perform real-time formative assessments three or more times per week in an ITS-based simulation environment (achieving over 80% accuracy).
Learners can enhance mathematical thinking applicable to real-world scenarios through VR-based problem-solving simulations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
